## IOverlayView interface

View that will be displayed inside a container view

The view can choose how to be docked to the container view, or to completely cover the container view.

See [DockingMode](./core-chat.dockingmode.md) for details on how to position a view in different docking modes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IOverlayView extends IView 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getDockingMode()](./core-chat.ioverlayview.getdockingmode.md) | Determines how the overlay view should be displayed. May return <code>undefined</code>, in which case it will not be displayed at all. |
|  [subscribe(fn)](./core-chat.ioverlayview.subscribe.md) | Subscribe to changes in the view that should cause the container view to render the overlay view again.<!-- -->The subscription is active until the overlay view is closed.<!-- -->More specifically, subscribers will be notified when the value of <code>getDockingMode()</code> changes. |
